title: Hayden Building Maintenance Corp.
about: The Hayden Building Maintenance Corp website is a modern and responsive web application designed to showcase the company's services and offerings in the roofing industry. The site is built using React, a popular JavaScript library, ensuring a seamless and dynamic user experience. It features components like react-icons, react-scroll, and react-youtube to enhance user engagement and navigation. The project utilizes styled-components for a visually appealing and consistent design across different devices. The back end is powered by Node.js and Express, utilizing technologies like axios, cors, and nodemailer to handle server-side tasks. Additionally, the site utilizes react-router-dom for efficient client-side routing and navigation. Overall, the Hayden Building Maintenance Corp website combines a range of modern technologies to create a professional and user-friendly online platform.

title: Sales Goal Tracker
about: Sales Goal Tracker is a web application that helps sales professionals and teams set, monitor, and achieve their sales targets. With real-time tracking and progress visualization, users can easily stay motivated and focused on their sales goals. The app also offers features such as log management, excluded jobs tracking, and goal reset, making it a valuable tool for sales performance management. Repo and website link are private, thank you.

title: Email Automation Application
about: The Email Automation Application is a Python-based tool built using the tkinter library for creating a user interface. It allows users to automate the process of sending emails to recipients listed in a CSV file. The application supports specifying the subject, email body, and can send emails with HTML content. It also includes features like saving and loading presets for email templates, stopping the email sending process, and scanning and updating the CSV file to remove invalid recipients.

title: SCBeauty
about: SCBeauty is a modern web application built using TypeScript, a typed superset of JavaScript that adds additional features to the language to improve code quality and maintainability. TypeScript is used throughout the project to ensure type safety and reduce errors. The front-end of the application is built with React.js, a popular JavaScript library used for building user interfaces. React.js is used to create components that make up the application's user interface. These components are written in a combination of TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. TypeScript is used to define the props and state of each component, while JavaScript is used to handle logic and events. CSS is used to style the components, and HTML is used to structure the content. The back-end of the application is built with Node.js, a popular JavaScript runtime built on the V8 engine. Node.js is used in conjunction with Express, a lightweight web framework for Node.js, to handle incoming requests and serve data from the database. Overall, SCBeauty2 leverages a combination of technologies and programming languages to create a fast, scalable, and user-friendly web application.

title: eCommerce - Firebase
about: Massive e-commerce application similar to Shopify using React, Redux, React Hooks, React Suspense, React Router, GraphQL, Context API, Firebase, Redux-Saga, Stripe + more. This is a full stack app (MERN stack), using Firebase.

title: Monsters Rolodex
about: A demo, single-paged react project which displays Robots, their names, and details about them in a card styled homepage. You also have the ability to sort through the monsters.
